entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to a few flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Wind becoming north 30 km/h before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 10:05 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 10:05 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
